target_assessment.type_match_reasoning: No findings were reported by the audit, so the target vulnerability was not identified.

notes: The audit reported 0 findings. The target vulnerability is a critical access_control issue in the createLockedCampaign function, where an arbitrary external call is made to a user-provided tokenLocker address. This allows an attacker to provide a malicious contract that can drain tokens from users who have approved the Hedgey contract. The audit failed to identify this critical vulnerability.
